reviews.review: Game is fun with new killers being released some free some paid. Good amount of toxic people but thats to be expected. It's a great game to play with friends or by yourself but expect to be whined at for being bad or as a killer camping or soft camping or patrolling or doing anything that has to do with strategy.
Хоть и помойка, но любимая помойка <3
每次去网吧都玩不起不是vcruntime140，就是easy anti-cheat，有大佬知道怎么解决不
优化虽然越来越好，但人类是越来越难玩了

强烈不推荐购买此游戏！！作为一个玩了近700小时的玩家，虽然没有经历过人类强大的历史，但是也是从4人打击的那段时间玩过来的。那时候，屠夫玩家想杀死一个逃生者，需要研究走位，研究套路。而人类则需要根据屠夫的走位，选择对自己最有利的做法。游戏性非常高，玩法也非常丰富，可以玩拆迁，可以摸宝贝，可以和屠夫周旋，可以修电机为团队做出贡献。

而现在呢？LT削了，双窗削了，甚至地图中人类的救命板都删掉了，你让人类玩家玩蛇？真的是排队半小时，游戏3分钟，而且游戏节奏越来越快，没有人去做别的事情了，全都是开局玩命的修电机，导致屠夫这边挂一人上钩，亮3台电机。然后就抱怨屠夫好弱，开发就加强屠夫，削弱人类。结果呢？人类更加玩命的修电机，屠夫杀死一个人之后，大门可以开了。如此恶性循环，我不知道这个游戏还能存活多久？

屠夫只需要无脑追人，根本不需要再担心要不要躲一下板子，不需要判断人类是不是要跳窗，只需要无脑追就好。再加上远程攻击的屠夫上线，砍趴一个人，只需要30秒。游戏体验很差。

我在想，与其这样改，倒不如把地图中所有的障碍物全部删除，木板全部删除，这样岂不是更方便屠夫杀人啦？

一句话，没有竞技的游戏都不会存活太久！杀机度过了一周年，那是因为杀手与人类之间存在微妙的竞技性。而现在呢？杀手单方面碾压逃生者，趋于一边倒形式，应该是撑不过3个月，机制不改，游戏必黄！

更重要的是，新玩家如果想入手此游戏，就要考虑一下花了82元却匹配不到其他玩家，无法开始游戏的这个现象。所以，在这里我强烈的不推荐购买此游戏。
Ну более менее оптимизирована,геймплей хороший,прокачка персонажа не очень
对于新手玩家来说，这个游戏十分的恐怖与刺激，前一两百个小时可能一脸懵逼，玩屠夫找不到人砍不死人，玩人类开局就被找到两下就上树。不过当你度过萌新的阶段后，有了一定的技能与经验，熟悉了地图与套路之后，这个 游戏的魅力也会逐渐向你展开。总的来说这款游戏是十分耐玩与好玩的游戏，基本上不存在玩腻的情况。倾力推荐！！！

Ive put alot of hours into Dead by Daylight and I used to main killer, started playing survivor so I could play with friends. Since the release of Freddy it has been the worst choice made by the devs to not work on fixing him quickly. Trying to juke him is impossible and when I say that its literal. No perk or any build counters him, not only can you barely find him if he is near you but he has no cooldown on how quick he can put you back in the dreamstate, mind you that to get out you have to give away you position by failing a skillcheck. The concept is great and I was pumped for Freddy but a killer that doesnt need deerstalker, or nurses calling, can stop gates from being opened because he hits a player a couple times and even if you manage to open the gate he can have Blood Warden which prevents you from leaving even further. The whole "get gud" isnt something possible against him, players try to adapt to him but his add ons prevent you from getting out the dreamstate which makes action speed 50% slower. Hopefully the Devs will actually do something about him before November 1st so all players can actually enjoy earning 2x bloodpoints, not just the killer.

So...

>Never played any 4vs1
>Second match ever, decide to try Killer
>Pick Huntress because "that sweet a..xe"
>2 minutes pass, find 1st survivor, hit him,  hook him, then go check on the others
>They free him, I hit the 2nd one, hook him
>They free the 2nd, I hit the 3rd one, hook him
>This goes on for a while as they keep freeing each other, they are not even going for the objectives now and it's getting way too long
>"Idea!"
>Find 4th, hook him, then stay in range for my hatchets
>"It works!" Bloody murder everyone as I use 4th one as a Meat bait
>Go on using the survivors as bait as they fall for it each and every time
>Round finally ends, I win



Apparently that's not a valid tactic and it's called camping, and that's how I was told to get a lot of diseases, that my mom is a lady of the night and that my dick should fall off.

This game is awesome, while I don't think that playing with random people is the most fun, playing with friends and just hunting each other while talking is some of the most terrifying and satisfying fun I've had. You don't even need 5 people, me and my friends play with 3 (one killer and two survivors) and we still manage to have a blast. I'd say 4 people is a very good amount so if you can get that, you're going to have a lot of fun.

Seriously consider this if you have a group of friends and enjoy just hanging out and scaring the piss out of each other.

Is this game fun?  For the most part, yes.  
Does this game have some serious, almost game breaking issues?  Oh my god yes.

The game's been buggy and full of exploits since it came out.  Every attempt to fix unsporting strategies merely creates more problems.  It might be excusable, if not for the fact that the game has since released DLC worth 150% of the game's value, and seems to prioritize development of DLC over fixing the gameplay.
There are also plenty of reasons NOT to play this game that are somewhat beyond the control of the devs.  This game has a seriously toxic community, on the level of League of Legends.  It's about 50% regular people who just play games for fun, and occasionally rage, and 50% people who will declare a blood vendetta against you for daring to be better/worse than them.  Is this beyond the control of the developers?  Yes.  Did the developers make the inconceivable choice to a post-game chat that adds nothing to the gameplay experience and is merely used as a tool for complete psychopaths to hurl abuse at random strangers?  Yes.

On the other hand, if you have at least 3 friends who you can talk into spending $20, I can almost assure you that you WILL enjoy this game.  Kill Your Friends is surprisingly polished, allowing use of all items, addons, and perks, allowing for experimentation and providing a place to learn.  It's actually the perfect experience for the casual gamer who wants to be able to experience everything the game has to offer.  Even more fun is being in the same skype/discord/third-party-voice-chat-of-your-choice with your fellow survivors and the killer, which adds another dimension of mindgaming and bluffing to the experience.

In short, unless you enjoy dealing with jerks on a daily basis, only buy this game if you have at least 3 other friends who have this game who will play with you.  Ranked multiplayer is horrid and full of exploits on both sides, half the community are terrible, but Kill Your Friends is a real gem.

This game is WILDLY in favour of the survivors. I just played a game that should have counted as a complete wipe as the killer. instead 2 of them disconnected and caused me to Derank. HOW IS THAT FAIR? What a shitty game. Such a cool idea but it's SO skewed in survivors favour.

Not only that they've begun to reward stupid tactic at this point as well. the game is meant to revolve around stealth and running away, but instead, I get swarmed by survivors the moment I down one, and they literally prevent me from moving even as I bash and slash them, because they added some ridiculous temprory invulnerabilty bullshit thing. Screw this game. Screw the development team involved with this. Thanks for ruining a potentially awesome game.

Dead by daylight is a game I have been playing since 2017 I would say around doctors release. It has many flaws and many strengths but no matter what anyone says, this game is a complete time consumer and is pretty grindy. Does that make it a bad thing? Not really. Many licensed chapters from our favorite horror films and a lot of cool perks to use, as well as their own characters that are pretty sweet. As a horror game it has its moments! Never go in expecting an Outlast experience though. Give it a try! You will either love it or hate it. I myself have met many cool people and still have fun to this day, even when playing killer.

Game is really fun, so many things to do and survive in different ways. Make choices that you wouldn't believe doing yourself. Great game 9/10. Only unfortunate thing is that their are campers and they're annoying. But hey that just tells you , you need to find a way to survive without getting caught

Nie i chuj, najprostsze co można teraz o tym powiedzieć.
Po aktualizacji systemu MMR Rankingowego gra osiągnęła poziom wewnętrznego gówna. Pomyślisz czemu tak krytycznie? A już śpieszę z wytłumaczeniem, w sumie chuj by mnie bolało gdyby to był kolejny przypadkowy bug po wyjebaniu się aktualizacji / albo testy nowego systemu przez jeden dzień. Nie oni wprowadzili CELOWY upadate pod rangi i system dobierania, który generalnie pierdoli się częściej niż Alfa na warsztacie. Po wprowadzeniu patcha, jak to ostatnio u nich bywa wszyscy wylądowali jak jeden mąż w najniższych rangach (popiół IV) kiedyś poprostu słynna 20. Przez pierwsze pare dni spoko zrozumiałe ze bedą braki balansów. Ale grając na prawie że najgorszych rangach z kumplem, dostajemy turbo kretynów do gry a po drugiej stronie stoi zabójca, z najwyższej obecnej rangi dojebany jak skurwysyn. Powiesz że pierdole i płacze XD ale jestem pewien że jest wielu co uważa tak samo o tej aktualizacji to samo. 

Kolejna rzecz, dodatki swego czasu ta gra miała dobre wsparcie, dodatki wychodziły sensowne a co najważniejsze kompletne. Od ostatnich 3 dodatków wychodzą ubogie i niedorobione. Co mam na myśli? Liczna ilość bugów (łańcuchy co trzymaja cie do usranej śmierci u Pinheada, świetnie zaprojektowane IA zombie dla Nemesis itd.) Z dodatkiem RE przez blisko 2 jak nie 3 miechy nie widzieliśmy nowej mapy, po naprawieniu nowej mapy zjebali starą mape i też nie działa. Niestety, przegrałem w tą gre tyle godzin a jedyne co moge powiedzieć po systemie rankingowym że nie ma meczu bez wkurwienia się, i już nawet nie chodzi o to że ludzie grają w tą gre jak najgorsze kurwy, ale o rozrzutność i bezcelowość tego systemu. Jak "nowicjusz" gówno z szarej rangi może dostać mistrza z czerwonej, co jak co ja już sie przyzwyczaiłem do braku sensu tej gry ale nowy gracz zrozumie że to nie dla niego i tyle.

Teraz największy paradoks tej gry czyli BALANS. Świetne słowo, a dokładnie jego brak. Pomimo iż gra ma pełny magazyn DLC w postaci zabójców, ocalałych to chcąc nie chcąc zauważycie że przeważnie starcia będą opierały się na tych samych postaciach. Zarówno grając killerem jak i ocalałym. Grając survem dostaniesz na 70% szans zabójce z kategorii: Huntress, Spirit, Wraith, Blight, Nurse słynna piątka, może kogoś pominąłem ale generalnie jest to ten zespół który psuje gre od samego patrzenia sie na nich. Żeby nie było że jestem SurvSidowy to grając killerem przerważnie zobaczysz powtarzające sie postacie odziane w jaskrawe toksyczne kolory tylko po to żeby zwracać na siebie uwagę i wkurwiać Cie. Latarki, palety, borrowed time itd. będą darli z Ciebie łacha bo balans gry nie pozwoli Ci ich zbyt skrzywdzić (jeżeli nie straciłeś życia w tej grze albo nie grasz którymś ze UN-SKILLOWEJ PIĄTKI). W sumie jedyne co może Ci dobrze pójść grająć przeciwko toksycznej teamówce to wkurwienie i w sumie nic wiecej. Oczywiście to nie wina gry że ludzie grają kurwy, winą gry jest to że na to pozwala. Mechanika nie ograniczna zarówno jednej jak i drugiej strony tak aby zachować kilimat i nie czynić ofiary (bo taka role gra) napastnikiem.

Niestety póki co nie polecam, obecny system nie szczędzi nikogo, jeżeli chcesz pochillować i tak pograć sobie z kumplem czy też drużyną to wątpie że przypadnie do gustu. Może pierwsze mecze potem urok opadnie i zobaczycie prawdziwe bagno. Jak jest sie toksycznym tryhardem to pewnie gra idealna xD. Póki nie wprowadzą jakiegoś sensownego balansu, który znormalizuje te rozgrywkę i przywróci różnorodność zabójców to może zmienię te opinie. Ale na to sie aktualnie nie zapowiada. Musieli by znerfić cudowną piątke oraz zmienic gameplay survem, Lub zbuffwać wszystkich pozostałych zabójców (co raczej bedzie trudne). No generalnie nie mi nad tym myśleć, moge powiedzieć tyle że w przeszłości ta gra była lepsza, albo jak to sie mówi "kiedyś to były czasy, teraz to czasów nie ma XD. 

W skrócie, niech wypierdola ten system rankingowy bo on ssie po same bille i chociaż Spróbują, wprowadzić jakikolwiek balans między rolą Zabójcy a ocalałym (żeby te słowa miały jakieś odzwierciedlenie) i niech unormują tych zabójców bo jest za duży odstęp pomiędzy skutecznością przez co cierpi różnorodność.

+ПЛЮСЫ ИГРЫ: 1 Задумка игры довольно интересна и на этом всееее. 2 Регулярно выходят сюрвы и маньяки.
-МИНУСЫ ИГРЫ: 1 Игра нестабилизированна. 2 Множество багов. 3 Множество пиздаболов разработчиков которые говорят "Мы фиксим баги", но они нихуя не фиксят, а если фиксят то только через полугодья. 4 Частично бываеют баги по вылету из игры, по лагающим маньякам(при которых невозможно играть) 5 Разрабы думают только о разработки имболансных маньяков и перков, но конкретно забивают на оптимизацию игры.
Игра 7 из 10. Реализации игры 3/10.

一款很好玩的游戏。但是萌新的游戏体验会很差。慢慢玩下去才会发现这个游戏有趣的不是怎么去赢，而是团队合作，不抛弃队友。

There have been some reviews on this game about bad servers and terrible waiting times. However, I am inclined to believe these were from an old patch of the game as I have not experianced any of this. Leavers are rare to come by so the only real issue is camPing killers- which are still pretty rare nowadays. 

This game is super fun and I really can't wait for more expansions and DLC (most of which are free!)

Only piece of advice is to to the "...with friends" option and select no friends if you want to solo queue as it seems faster to connect than the "survive" or "kill" options. 

:D  10/10 would run into the basement for an open chest and then be subsquently killed brutally again.

Wow, just wow. [b]This game[/b] has got to be one of the best games ever made. As you can see by my hours upon hours of gameplay, this game has me absolutely hooked! Its a great game to play with all of your bestest friends, and sometimes, you can make some in the game, too! Now, [b]is[/b] that a good game or not? Not like all of those other games that try to copy Dead by Daylight, nothing like them! They're all [b]terrible[/b] compared to Dead by Daylight! Lets look at that name, Dead By Daylight:

D: Damn, its Dead by Daylight!
E: Ernist, look! Its Dead by Daylight!
A: A good game? Thats what I call Dead by Daylight!
D: Dingle my Dongles, its Dead by Daylight!

B: Brother, can you pass me the copy of Dead by Daylight?
Y: You dont play Dead by Daylight? Nerd!

D: Dang it! I got killed in my favourite game, Dead by Daylight!
A: Arnold Schwarzenegger is a competitive Dead by Daylight player!
Y: Yes! My Dead by Daylight game finally updated!
L: Listen, I love Dead by Daylight!
I: I honestly LOVE Dead by Daylight!
G: Great Scott! Its my favorite game, Dead by Daylight!
H: Holy Moly, its Dead by Daylight!
T: Tea with Dead by Daylight? Heck yeah!

So, in conclusion, Dead by daylight has to be one of the most entertaining games I have played to date! Its got hours upon hours of fun gameplay, whacky strategies that you can sort out with your friends, and cool customisations to make your own character unique! If I was stuck on an island, and could only take one thing with me, it would be my Special 20 Year Anniversary Gold Plated Directors Cut Game Of The Year Edition of Dead By Daylight. I hope that you guys don't bully me too hard on my own opinion on this game, so if you dislike Dead by Daylight, then go away!

From Yours Truly,

Big Mike

人类玩家游戏体验极差，贴脸守尸鞭尸，顶配红处杀手遍地都是，而且很多杀手都卡的要命完全不能游戏。最近甚至还出现了透视提速的人类和杀手玩家。如果你说你跟车队玩，那对于新人杀手就又是一场灾难，估计能把别人玩的直接删游戏给差评，因为毫无公平性可言。做不好游戏体验这个差评我永远不会改。新人现在绝对不要买游戏，这个版本玩起来你会很难受的。

Execellent jeu je le recommande !

Great game! Just the whole vibe of being up close and personal with the killer at times gives you the thrill most games can't. And its even better when you're able to juke out the killer during a chase. Some people claim that Friday the 13th is way better than dead by daylight. The only thing I believe is better about Friday the 13th is how many items you can get. Other then that dead by daylight is way better because you can actually get away from the killer. Most of the time in Friday the 13th, the killer will stay on your tail until someone else distracts him, or if he just gives up running after you. And that happens rarely. Dead by daylight can feel repetitive at times but overall i feel dead by daylight is better. Definitely recommend both games, they are both good. Especially when you have friends to play the games with.
